snippet.title: Blueprint Bob - Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3509810/Blueprint_Bob_Demo/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=trailer&utm_medium=bio

Wishlist Blueprint Bob: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3215120/Blueprint_Bob/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=demo_trailer&utm_medium=bio

The Steam next fest has started and with it comes our free demo for Blueprint Bob. We've been working hard since winning the GMTK Game Jam 2024 and are looking forward to your feedback on the demo :D The game is scheduled for release Q2 2025.

00:00 - Trailer
00:37 - Free demo live now

#nextfest #steamdemo #gmtkjam
